verses.verse: <S%G80>Brothers,<s%> my <S%G2588>heart's<s%> <S%G2107>desire<s%> and <S%G1162>prayer<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G2474>Israel<s%> is, that they might be <S%G4991>saved.<s%>
For I <S%G3140>bear<s%> them <S%G3140>record<s%> that they <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2205>zeal<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but not <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1922>knowledge.<s%>

For they being <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G2212>going<s%> <S%G2212>about<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G5293>submitted<s%> themselves to the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> for <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G4100>believes.<s%>

For <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>describes<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> That the <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> things shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by them.

But the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>speaks<s%> on <S%G3779>this<s%> wise, <S%G2036>Say<s%> not in <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G305>ascend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven?<s%> (that is, to <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> from above:)

<S%G2228>Or,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>deep?<s%> (that is, to <S%G321>bring<s%> up <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G321>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>)

But <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> it? The <S%G4487>word<s%> is <S%G1451>near<s%> you, even in your <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and in your <S%G2588>heart:<s%> that is, the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2784>preach;<s%>

That <S%G1437>if<s%> you shall <S%G3670>confess<s%> with your <S%G4750>mouth<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and shall <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1453>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> you shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
For with the <S%G2588>heart<s%> man <S%G4100>believes<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> and with the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G3670>confession<s%> is <S%G3670>made<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
For the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him shall not be <S%G2617>ashamed.<s%>

For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>difference<s%> between the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> and the <S%G1672>Greek:<s%> for the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> over <S%G3956>all<s%> is <S%G4147>rich<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G1941>call<s%> on him.
For <S%G3956>whoever<s%> shall <S%G1941>call<s%> on the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall they <S%G1941>call<s%> <S%G1941>on<s%> him in <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have not <S%G4100>believed?<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G4100>believe<s%> in him of <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have not <S%G191>heard?<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G2784>preacher?<s%>

And <S%G5613>how<s%> shall they <S%G2784>preach,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they be <S%G649>sent?<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> How <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> are the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of them that <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G2097>glad<s%> <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things!<s%>

But they have not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%> For <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4100>believed<s%> our <S%G189>report?<s%>
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> comes by <S%G189>hearing,<s%> and <S%G189>hearing<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> Have they not <S%G191>heard?<s%> <S%G3304>Yes<s%> <S%G3304>truly,<s%> their <S%G5353>sound<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and their <S%G4487>words<s%> to the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G3625>world.<s%>

But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> Did not <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1097>know?<s%> <S%G4413>First<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> I will <S%G3863>provoke<s%> you to jealousy by them that are <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1484>people,<s%> and by a <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> I will <S%G3949>anger<s%> you.

But <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> is <S%G662>very<s%> <S%G662>bold,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> I was <S%G2147>found<s%> of them that <S%G2212>sought<s%> me not; I was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1717>manifest<s%> to them that <S%G1905>asked<s%> not <S%G1905>after<s%> me.

But to <S%G2474>Israel<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3650>All<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> long I have <S%G1600>stretched<s%> <S%G1600>forth<s%> my <S%G5495>hands<s%> to a <S%G544>disobedient<s%> and <S%G483>gainsaying<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>
